articles.title: Stock Corvette Z06 C7 Races Tuned Mustang GT, Ford Gets Handed Embarrassing Loss - autoevolution
articles.description: The seventh-generation Corvette Z06 is still one of America’s fastest-ever machines. On paper, it’s a genuine supercar and to beat it in a straight line with a Ford Mustang, you’d probably need either a very capable tune or at least a stock Shelby GT500, just…
articles.content: Not only does the Z06 Vette weigh around 180 lbs (80 kg) less than a Mustang GT, it also has better aerodynamic properties, plus a great deal more power and torque than the Ford’s gen III Coyote V8 c… [+1267 chars]

articles.title: Childish Gambino sued by rapper alleging copyright infringement over ‘This Is America’ - NME
articles.description: Childish Gambino has been sued for copyright infringement by rapper Kidd Wes, who alleges 'This Is America' copied the latter's song 'Made In America'.
articles.content:
